21850.「……緊張しますね 軍議なんて。\n ドゥラくんは 天魔クァバルナの復活について:
...I'm so nervous about the war council. I
wonder what Dura has found out about
Kukulkannibal's revival...

21852.「それでは これより\n ドルワーム機密軍議を 始める！:
And now we will begin the classified Dolworm
war council!

21853.「まずは 以前 報告した\n 天魔クァバルナの 復活に関する続報だ。\n 皆 心:
First, a follow-up to my earlier report on the
revival of Kukulkannibal. I want everyone to
listen with an open mind.

21854.「……私は あれから この天魔黙示録を\n 余すことなく 調べ上げた。:
Since then, I've been researching every bit of
this Heavenly Demon Apocalypse.

21855.「そして クァバルナ復活に関する\n 恐るべき事実に たどりついたのだ。:
And then we came to the terrible truth about
the resurrection of Quavarna.

21857.「天魔黙示録には こう書かれている。: In the Tianma Revelation, it is written.

21858.「……天魔クァバルナは 遠い昔\n 深き闇より現れ ドルワームの地に君臨した。\:
...Long ago, Kukulkannibal, the heavenly demon, emerged from the depths of darkness and reigned over the land of Dolworm. He brought
many disasters, and the people suffered.

21859.「天魔クァバルナは 滅することがない。\n 冥界にて キズを癒やすと\n ふたた:
Kukulkannibal will never be destroyed. When
healed in the underworld, he will return to
this world...

21860.「そして…… 前世の恨みと呪いにより\n さらに強靭な肉体を たずさえ\n 我ら:
And then... the bitterness and curses of our
past lives will make us stronger, and give us
endless despair...

21861.「そんな……。あのクァバルナが\n パワーアップして 帰ってくるってこと？\n:
Oh, no... you mean that Quabaluna is coming
back with an improved power-up? In this
Dolworm!

21863.「そう。始まったのだ。絶望の連鎖が……。: Yes. It has begun. The cycle of despair...

21864.「クァバルナが 何度でも よみがえるなら\n ボクらは いったい どうすればいい:
If Quabaluna can come back to life over and
over again, what the hell are we supposed to
do? Dolworm will be hunted forever!

21865.「この危機を逃れる方法は ただ ひとつ……。: There is only one way out of this crisis...

21866.「やつの身体を 滅することができないのであれば\n 我々に 残された手段は 天魔:
If we cannot destroy its body, the only means
left to us is to seal Kukulkannibal.

21867.「……事実 クァバルナが ここに現れる前も\n やつは 封印されていた。\n 先:
In fact, he was sealed up before Quabarna
showed up here. Our ancestors chose the same
path.

21868.「なるほど 封印か……。でも ドゥラくん。\n 封印なんて 簡単に できるものな:
I see... a seal... but, Dura... But, Dura...
how easy is it to seal something?

21869.「封印のために 必要な要素は ふたつ。\n まずは 復活した天魔クァバルナを\n:
There are two elements necessary for sealing
the demon. First, the revived Kukulkannibal
must be weakened to the point of death.

21870.「そして 封印のチカラを宿した聖具\n ゼキルの聖杭を やつの胸に突き立てれば…:
Then, if we thrust Zekir's Holy Stake, which contains the power of the seal, into his chest we can seal Quabarna in the depths of the
earth.

21871.「ゼキルの聖杭は まだ 我々の手にはない。\n しかし 材料さえ そろえば\n:
Zekir's Holy Stake is not yet in our possession. However, as long as I have the materials, I can make it with my own hands, so
it should be no problem.

21872.「王立騎士団の者は 来たるべき 決戦の日に備え\n 戦闘訓練に 従事してほしい。:
I want all members of the Royal Knights to
engage in combat training in preparation for
the decisive battle.

21873.「<pc>さんには ゼキルの聖杭を作るのに\n 必要な材料を 集めてもらおうと思:
I will ask <pc> to gather the
materials necessary to make Zekir's Holy
Stake. More on that later.

21874.「……以上が 天魔クァバルナを迎え撃つ\n 最良の策だと 私は考えた。\n 異論:
I thought the above was the best way to deal
with Kukulkannibal. You have no objection?

21875.「……ドゥラくん すごいよ。\n その作戦なら きっと うまくいくよ！:
Dura, that's great. I'm sure that plan will
work!

21876.「それでは 以上をもって\n 今回の機密軍議は 閉会とする！\n 各自 全力で:
With that, this classified military meeting is
adjourned! I urge you all to respond to the
situation as best you can!

21877.「<pc>さん。\n 先ほど お話しした通り ゼキルの聖杭の材料を\n あなたに:
<pc>. As I told you earlier, I need
you to gather the materials for Zekir's Holy
Stake.

21878.「ゼキルの聖杭を作るために 必要な材料は\n きんのゆびわと 聖木の枝の ふたつ:
To make Zekir's Holy Stake, two materials are
needed: Gold Ring and Holy Branch.

21879.「きんのゆびわは ウェナ諸島にある\n ヴェリナード城下町の アクセサリーショッ:
Gold Rings can be purchased at the Accessory
Shop in Verinard Castle Town in the Wena
Islands.

21880.「聖木の枝は オルフェア地方西の南東\n 川を渡った地や 呪われた大地などにいる:
Holy Branches are dropped by Treevil in Orphea
Region West, across the Southeast River, and
in the Cursed Land.

21881.「世界を自由に動ける あなたにこそ\n この仕事を 引き受けてもらいたいのです。:
You are the one who can move freely around the
world, and we need you to take on this task.
Will you help us?

21882.「ありがとうございます <pc>さん。\n 私は 院長室に戻っていますので\n:
Thank you <pc>. I am back in the
Director's room, so please come back there
when you have all the materials.

21885.「もしかして…… クァバルナの呪いが\n ドゥラくんの身体を……？:
Could it be... that the curse of Qabaluna has
taken over Dura's body?

21886.「……ご心配なく ラミザ王子。\n ただ このところ 不眠不休で\n クァバルナ:
...Don't worry, Prince Ramiza. It's just that
I've been working tirelessly on Quavarna for
the past few days...

21887.「……そっか。それなら\n 作戦は 決まったんだし もう大丈夫だよ。\n ドゥラ:
I see. Well then, since the plan has been
decided, we'll be fine now. Dura, take a good
rest.

21888.「……お心づかい 痛み入ります。\n 院長室に戻ったら すこし休むとしましょう。:
Thank you very much for your kindness. When I
return to the Director's room, I will rest a
little. Now then...

21889.「ボクも 騎士団長室に戻ります。\n <pc>さん ゼキルの聖杭の件\n よろし:
I'm going back to the knight captain room.
<pc> Please take care of Zekir's Holy
Stake for me.

21890.「……おや <pc>さん。\n 困ったことに あなたは 他の方の依頼を\n たく:
...Oh <pc>. Trouble is, you seem to
have a lot of requests from others.

21891.「……そうですか。それは 困りました。\n あなたは ドルワームの者ではないので:
...I see. That's a problem. You are not from
Dolworm, so I can't give you orders.

21892.「ああ <pc>さん。\n 我々に 救いの手を差し伸べるため\n 戻ってきてくれ:
Oh <pc>. You've come back to offer us
a helping hand, haven't you?

21893.「復活する 天魔クァバルナに対抗するには\n やつを 封印する以外 道はありませ:
The only way to defeat the Demon Revive
Kukulkannibal is to seal him up. For that, we
need Zekir's Holy Stake.

21894.「ゼキルの聖杭を作るために 必要な材料は\n きんのゆびわと 聖木の枝の ふたつ:
To make Zekir's Holy Stake, we need two
materials: Gold Ring and Holy Branch. I need
you to gather these materials.

21895.「きんのゆびわは ウェナ諸島にある\n ヴェリナード城下町の アクセサリーショッ:
Gold Rings can be purchased at the Accessory
Shop in Verinard Castle Town in the Wena
Islands.

21896.「聖木の枝は オルフェア地方西の南東\n 川を渡った地や 呪われた大地などにいる:
Holy Branches are dropped by Treevil in Orphea
Region West, across the Southeast River, and
in the Cursed Land.

21897.「世界を自由に動ける あなたにこそ\n この仕事を 引き受けてもらいたいのです。:
You are the one who can move freely around the
world, and we need you to take on this task.
Will you help us?

29830.「しかし 天魔クァバルナの封印には\n あなたの協力が 不可欠です。\n 手が空:
However, your cooperation is essential to the
sealing of Kukulkannibal. Will you come back
here when you are free?

29831.「しかし 天魔クァバルナの封印には\n あなたの協力が 不可欠です。\n 気が変:
However, your cooperation is essential to the
sealing of Kukulkannibal. If you change your
mind, please come back here.
